rules_text:
As Danaj Fortress enters, you may pay 1 life. If you don't, Danaj Fortress enters tapped.
Satrapies you control have “{T}: Add {G}.”
flavor_text:
[i]“Why risk extending a blossom of aid when it is so easily shorn? As long as I am Life, so too must we flourish—if needs be, in solitude.”
—Dali of a Thousand Eyes[/i]
